channel.description: Latest crypto news from SosoValue Research

item.title: Bessant: The quality of trade agreements is more important than the timing of signingOn July 21, U.S. Treasury Secretary Benson said that trade negotiations are currently ongoing and he is more concerned about reaching a high-quality agreement rather than completing the agreement before August 1. Benson said that they are not in a hurry, but it is conceivable that the EU will want to negotiate faster, but at least the EU is now more engaged. Its current priority is to get the best deal for the United States (on the issue of Japan). Some analysts said that Benson's remarks indicate that "delaying tactics" are likely to appear again by August 1, so people can wait and see. At the same time, Benson said on the issue of Powell, "Ultimately, this is Trump's decision on Powell." He then added that they need to look at the Federal Reserve as a whole institution. [PANews]

item.title: US Treasury Secretary Bessent: The quality of signing a trade agreement is more important than the timing of signing itU.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent stated that trade negotiations are currently underway, and he is more concerned with reaching a high-quality agreement than completing an agreement before August 1. Bessent said that they are not in a hurry, but he can imagine that the EU would like to negotiate faster, but at least the EU is now more engaged. His top priority is to secure the best deal for the United States (on the Japan issue). Some analysts say that Bessent's remarks indicate that "delaying tactics" are likely to occur again by August 1, so people can wait and see. At the same time, Bessent said on the issue of Powell, "Ultimately, this is Trump's decision on Powell." He then added that they need to examine the Federal Reserve as a whole institution. (Golden Ten) [Odaily]

item.title: BNB Hack’s Latest Winners Announced: Basement, DeFi Copilot, BIBIMOn July 21, BNB Chain announced the results of the latest batch of BNB Hack (6/23–7/17). The social protocol Basement (DeSoc direction), AI-driven DeFi assistant DeFi Copilot, and strategy tool BIBIM (AI direction) successfully won awards, all of which can receive $3,000.00 USDT bonus, $50,000.00 Kickstart reward package, and official Demo Day display opportunities. At the same time, Peridot and Agent Einstein in the AI direction entered the incubation observation list. This round received 30+ submissions from developers around the world, including from the offline event in New York: Basement: Provides an instant social layer for web pages, combined with AI Agents to achieve one-click chat, interaction, rewards and information aggregation DeFi Copilot: A one-stop PancakeSwap trading assistant that integrates real-time analysis, one-click ordering, and automatic management BIBIM: Using visual interfaces and AI to simplify strategy building, testing, and monetization, reducing the complexity of DeFi BNB Hack is a long-term hackathon launched by BNB Chain for Web3 innovation directions such as AI, DeSoc, DeSci, and DePIN. It has received more than 200 global submissions and has selected 9 Tier 3 projects and 40 potential projects. [PANews]

item.title: BTCS Discloses $242.00M ETH and Cash Market Cap, Plans to Issue $10.00M Convertible BondsBTCS Inc. (BTCS), a US stock Ethereum strategic reserve company, recently announced that the total market value of its holdings of 55,788 ETH, cash, and other liquid assets is approximately $242.00 million, based on an ETH price of $3,600.00. In addition, the company has agreed to issue $10.00 million in convertible bonds through a $56.00 million financing arrangement with ATW Partners LLC, with a conversion premium of 198%. To date, BTCS has raised $189.00 million in 2025 through its signature DeFi / TradFi value-added strategy, including $132.00 million (70%) raised through market sales, $17.00 million (9%) in above-market convertible debt, and $40.00 million (21%) in Aave-based stablecoin loans. BTCS's ETH holdings have increased by 516% since the beginning of the year, with an average purchase cost of $2,846.00. [Foresight News]

item.title: Selini Capital withdrew 8.273M USDC from HyperliquidAccording to Arkham monitoring, Selini Capital: 0xfF…463C withdrew 8.273 million USDC from Hyperliquid at 17:49. HypurrScan data shows that Selini Capital has cumulatively earned $9.62 million in profits trading on Hyperliquid, including $2.305 million in contract profits. [Foresight News]

item.title: A whale that has held BTC for 12 years transferred 250 BTC to Binance today and still holds 4,000 BTC.According to @EmberCN monitoring, a BTC whale holding for 12 years transferred 250 BTC (approximately $29.68M) to Binance today. This address first accumulated 5,000 BTC in November 2013 at a price of $332 per coin, and began selling them successively in November 2024. To date, 1,000 coins have been sold at an average price of $102,410. It currently still holds 4,000 BTC, worth approximately $474.00M. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Tether CEO: 66% of USDt on-chain transfers come from West Asia, the Middle East and AfricaOn July 21, Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino tweeted that USDt is growing rapidly around the world, especially in emerging markets. In the first half of 2025, USDt on-chain transfers increased by 120% compared to the full year of 2024, of which 66% of the transfers came from West Asia, the Middle East and Africa. [PANews]

item.title:
Binance Wallet to Launch Exclusive Booster Event for Treehouse (TREE)According to the official announcement, Binance Wallet will launch an exclusive Booster event for Treehouse (TREE).
Event time: July 22, 2025 08:00:00 to July 29, 2025 07:59:59 (UTC+8) Total reward: $750,000.00 equivalent in TREE tokens Reward distribution: 2,500,000.00 TREE will be distributed on the day of the token generation event, and the remaining tokens will be distributed on the second day of trading. Participation conditions: Participants must hold a Binance non-custodial wallet that has been backed up. There are no Binance Alpha point requirements for this event.
Activity 1: Stake at least 0.01 ETH into the Simple Yield Treehouse ETH pool to equally share $200,000.00 worth of TREE tokens. During the event period, users who are eligible and stake at least 0.01 ETH into the Binance Wallet Simple Yield Treehouse ETH pool will be able to equally share $200,000.00 worth of TREE.
Activity 2: Stake at least 0.01 ETH into the Simple Yield Treehouse ETH pool to share $550,000.00 worth of TREE tokens. During the event period, all eligible users who stake at least 0.01 ETH into the Binance Wallet Simple Yield Treehouse ETH pool will be able to share an annualized yield increase reward of $550,000.00 worth of TREE tokens, with a daily prize pool of $78,571.00 worth of TREE. [Odaily]

item.title: Morocco’s Central Bank Completes Draft Crypto Assets BillOn July 21, the Governor of the Central Bank of Morocco stated at the African Central Bank Conference in Rabat that Morocco has finalized a draft law to legalize the use of crypto assets. The law ensures "adequate protection of consumers and investors, strengthens market integrity, combats fraud, manipulation, money laundering and terrorist financing, and maintains financial stability." [PANews]

item.title: Arthur Hayes calls for pushing ETH to $5,000.00On July 21, Arthur Hayes, co-founder of BitMEX, posted on the X platform, "Fam can we pump $ETH to $5k by Friday?" and interacted with FSInsight chief strategist Thomas Lee, saying that he has traditional financial power and called for a joint push to increase ETH prices. [PANews]

item.title: The Ether Machine plans to go public through a business combination with Nasdaq-listed Dynamix. If approved by shareholders and other conditions are met, the transaction is expected to be completed in the fourth quarter of this year.According to official sources, The Ether Machine will conduct a business combination with Dynamix Corporation (Nasdaq: DYNX) through The Ether Reserve, LLC entity. The merged entity will subsequently be listed on Nasdaq under the ticker symbol "ETHM." The company is expected to launch with over 400,000 ETH, with core support primarily contributed by Andrew Keys, an early member of Consensys and founder of the Enterprise Ethereum Alliance (EEA), with approximately $645.00M (169,984 ETH). Additionally, it has secured over $800.00M in common stock financing from top institutions, native cryptocurrency entities, and strategic investors such as 1Roundtable Partners / 10T Holdings, Archetype, Blockchain.com, cyber•Fund, Electric Capital, Kraken, and Pantera Capital. The transaction is projected to generate over $1.60B in gross proceeds, including over $1.50B in fully committed financing and up to $170.00M in cash held in Dynamix's trust account, potentially becoming the largest public ETH-producing company. The boards of directors of The Ether Machine and DYNX have unanimously approved the proposed business combination, which is expected to be completed in the fourth quarter of 2025, pending shareholder approval and other customary closing conditions. [Odaily News]

item.title: Cambodia's large-scale anti-fraud operation halts the business of Potato Guaranteed Public Groups.On July 14, the Cambodian government launched a nationwide crackdown on online scams, arresting 2,270 criminal suspects as of July 18. According to on-chain analysis firm Bitrace, during this period, the escrow addresses of the Cambodia-based cryptocurrency transaction escrow platform "Potato Escrow" stopped transferring funds, the scale of merchant deposit payments dropped to nearly zero, and the public group business basically stalled. The private group business briefly declined before partially recovering. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Antalpha's shareholders' meeting passed several important resolutions, including increasing the company's authorized share capital and restructuring share classes.Antalpha Platform Holdings held a special general meeting, with a total of 19,318,273 common shares voting at the meeting, representing approximately 81.6% of the company's total common shares as of June 20, 2025. At this general meeting, the company's shareholders approved the following proposals: increasing the company's authorized share capital from "$50,000.00, divided into 50,000,000 common shares with a par value of $0.001" to "$62,500.00, divided into 62,500,000 common shares with a par value of $0.001"; reclassifying 59,375,000 authorized common shares as Class A common shares, while reclassifying 3,125,000 unissued authorized common shares as Class B common shares; amending the company's articles of association and memorandum to reflect the new authorized share capital structure; the Chairman of the Board and CEO of the company may receive an award of up to 1.50M Class B common shares under the 2024 Equity Incentive Plan; and the company will adopt a financial management plan to improve the company's financial management. All of the above proposals have been approved. [Foresight News]

item.title: Co-founder Joseph Lubin will serve as the torchbearer for Ethereum's 10th anniversary, saying the protocol has been running stably and uninterruptedly for ten years.On July 21, Ethereum co-founder Joseph Lubin was invited to be the torchbearer for the 10th anniversary celebration of Ethereum. He said that the Ethereum protocol has been running stably for nearly ten years since its release, and even though it has undergone several major upgrades during this period, it has never lost a block, demonstrating the high reliability and strong vitality of the protocol. [PANews]

item.title: 3 Token Unlocks to Watch in the Fourth Week of July 2025As the fourth week of July 2025 begins, several major token unlocks will shake up the crypto market. Projects like Avail (AVAIL), Venom (VENOM), amd AltLayer (ALT) are releasing new tokens into circulation. These events could significantly alter supply dynamics, introducing short-term price swings and heightened market activity. 1. Avail (AVAIL) Avail is a horizontally scalable network that enables seamless cross-chain interoperability , fast transaction verification, and decentralized data availability. With components like availDA, availNexus, and availFusion, it empowers developers to build scalable, secure, and connected Web3 applications. On July 23, the project will unlock 972.85 million AVAIL tokens, valued at approximately $19.46 million. This is equivalent to 38.23% of the current circulating supply. Avail will distribute 500.00 million tokens to core contributors. Furthermore, investors will get 353.13 million AVAIL. The team will also award 66.67 million tokens for ecosystem development and 53.06 million tokens to the community and research. 2. Venom (VENOM) Venom is a heterogeneous multi-blockchain system with dynamic sharding capabilities. It is built on the Threaded Virtual Machine (TVM) and utilizes Mesh network technology for enhanced efficiency and scalability. The project will release 59.26 million VENOM on July 25, following its monthly pattern of cliff token unlocks. Moreover, the tokens are worth $12.67 million and represent 2.84% of the current circulating supply. A majority of the unlocked tokens, 17.92 million, will go toward the ecosystem. Early backers will receive 15.00 million tokens, and the community will get 15.84 million. Lastly, the team will collect 10.50 million VENOM. 3. AltLayer (ALT) AltLayer is a decentralized protocol designed to launch highly scalable and customizable rollups. It’s often described as a rollup-as-a-service (RaaS) platform. The network will unlock 240.10 million ALT tokens, valued at $9.01 million. This unlock accounts for 6.39% of the circulating supply. Additionally, the supply will be split six ways. AltLayer will award 64.25 million tokens to investors. The treasury will also get 52.25 million ALT. The network will keep 41.31 million tokens earmarked for protocol development. The team will receive 36.44 million tokens, the ecosystem and community will gain 29.17 million ALT, and finally, 16.68 million tokens will be kept for advisors. In addition to these three, Sahara (SAHAR), Soon (SOON), and Undeads Games (UDS) will also experience new supply entering the market. Overall, over the next seven days , the market will welcome tokens worth more than $96.70 million. []

item.title: Jingwei Tiandi: Launching a self-developed global stable currency payment platformOn July 21, Jingwei Tiandi announced on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange that the company announced its entry into the field of crypto payments and will release its first mobile application "Fopay" on July 21, 2025, providing a one-stop payment platform. Fopay is developed based on the concept of stablecoin crypto payments and currently provides stablecoin custody and prepaid card payment functions through several licensed partners. The board of directors believes that the launch of Fopay and new business segments can explore more business opportunities for the company and benefit shareholders as a whole. [PANews]

item.title: Analyst: Ethereum is expected to reach around $8,000.00 in early 2026, with its price structure similar to the 1980s Dow Jones bull market patternOn July 21, Cointelegraph reported that analyst Gert van Lagen pointed out that Ethereum (ETH) is in the "final surge" stage and may move towards the $8,000.00 price level. He found that ETH's current price structure is strikingly similar to the bull market pattern of the Dow Jones Index in 1980. The analysis is based on the "textbook expansion diagonal" pattern, which has provided strong support for Ethereum's main rebound since mid-2022. Currently, ETH is trading between the upper and lower boundaries of this pattern, and is expected to reach the upper boundary of about $8,000.00 in early 2026. Technically, ETH has re-established a multi-year upward trend line as support and is consolidating within an ascending triangle pattern. A break above the $3,900.00-$4,150.00 level resistance zone could trigger a rise to $7,150.00, close to the target price of the trumpet pattern. Analysts say that macroeconomic factors such as the expected Fed rate cuts and continued ETH ETF inflows may support this upward trend. [Techflow]
